name: PizzaTypes
0:
”Alexa, ask Pizza Types what's a hawaiian pizza”
”Alexa, ask Pizza Types what's in a california style pizza”
”Alexa, tell Pizza Types to describe a new york style pizza”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pizza types
des: This Alexa Skill will teach you all about different types of Pizza. Just ask Alexa about the type of pizza you'd like to learn about. For instance, ask it what a Hawaiian pizza is, and Alexa will not only tell you what toppings are included on the pizza, but some general knowledge as well.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
